Denial Types: Eligibility, Authorization, Timely Filing, Incomplete Info, Duplicate Claims, COB
Description: Denials due to administrative non-compliance
Denial AI Agent Solution: AI Agent verifies eligibility and authorization in real-time, flags missing info, and automates resubmissions.
Input Data Source: EDI 837/835 data, payer policy guidelines, eligibility databases

Denial Types: Medical Necessity, Experimental, Non-Covered Service, Level of Care, Place of Service
Description: Issues with medical need and service appropriateness
Denial AI Agent Solution: AI Agent reviews clinical documentation, matches to medical necessity guidelines, and suggests additional documentation.
Input Data Source: Medical records, payer-specific medical policies, federal and state medical necessity guidelines

Description: Errors in coding, modifiers, or billing rules
Denial AI Agent Solution: AI Agent checks coding compliance, applies correct modifiers, and flags billing rule errors before submission.
Input Data Source: Coding guidelines (ICD-10, CPT, HCPCS), payer billing rules, compliance documents

Denial Types: Documentation Issues, Medical Review, Minor Coding Errors
Description: Reworkable denials, often related to documentation or minor errors
Denial AI Agent Solution: AI Agent identifies missing documentation, alerts teams, and automates resubmission once completed.
Input Data Source: Electronic health records (EHR), best practices for documentation, payer documentation requirements

Description: Non-reversible denials requiring appeals
Denial AI Agent Solution: AI Agent suggests appeal opportunities based on payer rules and provides pre-filled templates for faster resolution.
Input Data Source: Payer-specific policies, appeal guidelines, historical denial overturn success rates

Denial Types: Behavioral Health, Oncology, Cardiology, Orthopedics, Radiology
Description: Specialty-specific claims needing additional scrutiny
Denial AI Agent Solution: AI Agent understands specialty nuances, flags errors, and recommends documentation to ensure approval.
Input Data Source: Specialty-specific payer policies, federal mandates for specialty care, historical EDI data

Description: Claims reduced to zero due to coverage or adjustments
Denial AI Agent Solution: AI Agent detects revenue opportunities in zero-balance claims, flagging write-offs for potential recovery.
Input Data Source: EDI 835 data, provider contracts, historical patterns in zero-balance adjustments

Description: Preventive services outside plan restrictions
Denial AI Agent Solution: AI Agent checks payer policies, suggests adjustments, and re-qualifies routine services for approval.
Input Data Source: Payer preventive guidelines, federal preventive care mandates (e.g., ACA), patient medical history

Description: Coverage and coding issues in outpatient care
Denial AI Agent Solution: AI Agent checks codes, ensures eligibility, and proactively submits corrected claims.
Input Data Source: Outpatient coding guidelines, ambulatory care policies, historical denial trends for outpatient services

Description: Network or facility alignment issues
Denial AI Agent Solution: AI Agent verifies provider status in real-time, reducing out-of-network errors and facility issues.
Input Data Source: Network provider databases, payer-specific provider status and alignment requirements

Description: Multi-factorial denials, often complex
Denial AI Agent Solution: AI Agent analyzes multi-issue claims, corrects each issue, and manages bundled resubmissions.
Input Data Source: Comprehensive claims data (EDI 837), payer rules, historical outcomes for complex denial cases

Description: Denials needing detailed review due to high dollar value
Denial AI Agent Solution: AI Agent prioritizes high-value claims, verifies documentation, and submits detailed appeals.
Input Data Source: Payer-specific high-dollar policies, historical high-dollar claim outcomes, detailed EHR data

Description: Smaller claims that may not be cost-effective to appeal
Denial AI Agent Solution: AI Agent corrects small claims in bulk and automates batch resubmissions to recover revenue.

Description: Transmission or system-based issues
Denial AI Agent Solution: AI Agent identifies and corrects system errors, ensuring EDI compliance and reducing rejections.

Description: Denials tied to payer policies or network restrictions
Denial AI Agent Solution: AI Agent reviews payer-specific policies and adjusts network preferences for compliance.

Description: Denials based on provider agreements with payers
Denial AI Agent Solution: AI Agent tracks agreements, flags non-compliant claims, and aligns submissions with contractual terms.

Denial AI Agent Solution: AI Agent detects upcoding and unbundling, suggests corrections, and flags for review.
